response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by us due to its unique features and capabilities. Given your interest and the value you place on it, we're offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional deal considering its market value and the benefits it will bring to you. We believe this price reflects a fair compromise between its true worth and your perceived value. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. Let's discuss further if this offer aligns with your expectations.", "product_price": 9500}
